did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Douglas D. Martin, 1885-1963, was an author, newspaperman, educator; University of Arizona journalism faculty, 1946-1956. This collection contains correspondence relating to nominations for the Arizona Newspaper Hall of Fame; an annual award sponsored jointly by the University of Arizona Dept. of Journalism and the Arizona Newspapers Association.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.
